icuovz.config.block.beacon.tooltip:
Render distance for the beacon's beam.
Vanilla: 256 blocks
icuovz.config.block.min.tooltip:
Renders all block-entities within this range. This will only increase block-entity render distance, not reduce it.
The vanilla render distance for most block entities varies between a flat 64 and 100 blocks.
icuovz.config.entity.max.tooltip:
Prevents entities beyond this range from being rendered, regardless of their sizes.
This overrides all other settings.
icuovz.config.entity.min.tooltip:
Forces entities within this range to be rendered, regardless of their sizes.
This value will scale with the FOV if enabled.
icuovz.config.fovScaling.tooltip:
Adjusts the render distance when zooming.
This scales all settings except for Entity Max.
